Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Grand Cane -- 4.63 Mills - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Village of Grand Cane Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Grand Cane, State of Louisiana (the "Village"), levy a special tax of four and sixty-three hundredths (4.63) mills on all property subject to taxation within the Village (an estimated $6,350 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and improving the sewerage system of the Village and maintaining and improving public streets in the Village?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire District No. 3 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall DeSoto Parish Fire District No. 3, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $350,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Waterworks District No. 1 -- .99 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Waterworks District No. 1 of the Parish of DeSoto, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ninety-nine hundredths (.99) of a mill tax on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $738,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of maintaining, operating and improving the District's waterworks system, including property, equipment and facilities necessary therefor?
